page.title: 01The Town of Pontefract.
page.content: {Pontefract}is a very old town which recently celebrated the 500th anniversary of the granting of the Town Charter.King Richard III let the town hold a market when he granted the {Charter}and market days are still very important.The open air market is held every Wednesday and Saturday, the Market Hall is open every day except Sunday. The ruins of the{Castle}are close to the town centre,they are a good place to explore.The{Park}is another nice place to go.Horse races are often held and the crowds cheer from the Grandstand.There is a boating lake and tennis courts and plenty of open grassy places for picnicing. The{swimming baths}and the{library are newly built.These,and the new shopping precinct,where no cars are allowed,make the town much nicer.
